body:
So yeah, recently I got 100k kills. I never thought I would ever reach this goal, not in any number of years you would have given me. I also said that I might be leaving at this number, thinking that Avicus was all but a blur to me. However, whether you like it or not, I'm gonna stick around for a while to see what happens with this whole "nise update" and the tournament. 

So all boring crap aside, this milestone also meets up very closely to my 2 year anniversary on this server. 

SO .____.

I decided that I want to do something. What is it you guys want? Should I do a minitage? Should I release a pack? Should I do another AMA video? Should I do a thank you to everyone who has been here through my "Avicus Journey" so to speak? Let me know what you want to see and I'll damn well do it.

Have a nice day and thanks for your time :]

replies.body:
@Dynamo 
One's actions begins with another's beliefs.

@Pand
Maybe next year.

I think what I'm going to do depends entirely upon what goes better. Since everyone's asking for a minitage/montage I'm going to try my best to get one out. If not I think Ill be releasing 2+ packs to make up for it :)
